info.title: GeoWS UnFunded Waterlevel Tides
info.description: Demonstration of accessing NGDC Waterlevel Tides services using GeoWS technology. For more information about waterlevel tides, see NGDC Tides DataExtract Services

get.description: The waterleveltides service provides station names and waterlevel data

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: overview - shows only stations, for waterlevel values, choose one of [year, month, day, hour, minute, full]

parameters.name: stationIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list, e.g. 9411166,MAHU  - empty list selects any.

parameters.name: minlongitude
parameters.description: western limit

parameters.name: maxlongitude
parameters.description: eastern limit

parameters.name: minlatitude
parameters.description: southern limit

parameters.name: maxlatitude
parameters.description: northern limit

parameters.name: starttime
parameters.description: start time for desired coverage

parameters.name: endtime
parameters.description: end time for desired coverage

parameters.name: skipNullLatLong
parameters.description: don't output records when the location is null

parameters.name: selectNullLatLong
parameters.description: show records when the location is null

parameters.name: skipNullDatumTime
parameters.description: don't output records when the availability times are null

parameters.name: selectNullDatumTime
parameters.description: show records when the availability times are null

get.description: The wssversion service provides the version number of this service)
The wssversion service provides the version number of this WebServiceShell (WSS))
